interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2013/04/12
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Zemeckis'], 'Producers': ['Robert Zemeckis', 'Steve Starkey', 'Carl Sagan', 'Ann Druyan'], 'Starring': ['Jodie Foster', 'Matthew McConaughey', 'James Woods']}
Review Text: This movie is one heck of a ride.  It will leave you guessing until the end, all the performances are really well done.  The special effects are still holding up but are showing their age, but all in all it's a very good story and isn't that what makes a good movie?
Review Title: Worth it!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
